fields.summary: GSC: Update a row (by explicit range)

content.text: to update a specific row range
I can modify existing data in place.
Select the Google Drive location for your spreadsheet.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Select action control, default value “My google drive”
Select the spreadsheet you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Drive control
Select the tab you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Spreadsheet control. Value is sheetId.
Select the row you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Sheet control. Value is the index of the row.
column name is populated by on change event triggered by Sheet control. One column per Sheet Column where column name is the header of the sheet (row 0 values)
Response generated by the Sheets API or Errors with actionable messages

fields.summary: GSC: Get row(s) — read all rows in a sheet/range

content.text: to read rows from a sheet
Select the Google Drive location for your spreadsheet.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Select action control, default value “My google drive”
Select the spreadsheet you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Drive control
Select the tab you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Spreadsheet control. Value is sheetId.
Response generated by the Sheets API or Errors with actionable messages
to delete a range of rows or columns
I can remove unwanted data blocks.
Select the Google Drive location for your spreadsheet.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Select action control, default value “My google drive”
Select the spreadsheet you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Drive control
Select the tab you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Spreadsheet control. Value is sheetId.
Response generated by the Sheets API or Errors with actionable messages

Select Credential → Load Available Drives for that User → User selects Drive → Load all spreadsheets from Drive → User  selects spreadsheet → Load Spreadsheet data and extract worksheets → User selects Worksheet → User selects Direction, inputs Start and End Positions → User adds response variable
Given a spreadsheet with that ID exists, and a worksheet with that ID exist, then target Dimension is removed from Start to End. Return empty body on success or appropriate errors.
I can keep the spreadsheet tidy.
Select the Google Drive location for your spreadsheet.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Select action control, default value “My google drive”
Select the spreadsheet you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Drive control
Select the tab you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Spreadsheet control. Value is sheetId.
Response generated by the Sheets API or Errors with actionable messages

Select Credential → Load Available Drives for that User → User selects Drive → Load all spreadsheets from Drive → User  selects spreadsheet → Load Spreadsheet data and extract worksheets → User selects Worksheet → User adds response variable

Given a spreadsheet with that ID exists, and a worksheet with that ID exist, then target sheet is removed. Return empty body on success or appropriate errors (error for the last remaining sheet as well).
to add a sheet within an existing spreadsheet
I can organize data by tabs.
Select the Google Drive location for your spreadsheet.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Select action control, default value “My google drive”
Select the spreadsheet you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Drive control
Select the tab you want to modify.
Column headers for you new spreadsheet. Values must be separated by comma ( , ).
Overwrite existing worksheet with the same title
Response generated by the Sheets API or Errors with actionable messages

Select Credential → Load Available Drives for that User → User selects Drive → Load all spreadsheets from Drive → User  selects spreadsheet → User inputs required values  →  User adds response variable

Given a spreadsheet with that ID exists create sheets with given title. If Headers is inputted I expect to see them on the first row. If Overwrite is checked and Worksheet exists replace worksheet else create a new one with the same title and a counter.  Return POST/PUT API response on success or appropriate errors.

fields.summary: GSC: Clear all data from a sheet (or range)

content.text: to clear values from a sheet or range
I can reset content without deleting the sheet.
Select the Google Drive location for your spreadsheet.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Select action control, default value “My google drive”
Select the spreadsheet you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Drive control
Select the tab you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Spreadsheet control. Value is sheetId.
Response generated by the Sheets API or Errors with actionable messages

Select Credential → Load Available Drives for that User → User selects Drive → Load all spreadsheets from Drive → User  selects spreadsheet → Load Spreadsheet data and extract worksheets → User selects worksheet → User inputs range values  →  User adds response variable

Given a spreadsheet with that ID exists and a worksheet with that ID or name  exists, if range is inputted clear selected range else clear entire worksheet . Return POST API response on success or appropriate errors.
to add a new row at the end of a table
Select the Google Drive location for your spreadsheet.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Select action control, default value “My google drive”
Select the spreadsheet you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Drive control
Select the tab you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Spreadsheet control. Value is sheetId.
column name is populated by on change event triggered by Sheet control. One column per Sheet Column where column name is the header of the sheet (row 0 values)
Response generated by the Sheets API or Errors with actionable messages

Select Credential → Load Available Drives for that User → User selects Drive → Load all spreadsheets from Drive → User  selects spreadsheet → Load Spreadsheet data and extract worksheets → User selects worksheet -> Load spreadsheet values and extract headers (values from the first row)  → User inputs values corresponding to each column header →  User adds response variable
Given a spreadsheet with that ID exists and a worksheet with that ID or name  exists, a new row is appended at end of table. Return Update API response on success or appropriate errors.
to append a row if a key isn’t present, or update the existing row if it is
Select the Google Drive location for your spreadsheet.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Select action control, default value “My google drive”
Select the spreadsheet you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Drive control
Select the tab you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Spreadsheet control. Value is sheetId.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Sheet control. options are headers found in sheet
column name is populated by on change event triggered by Sheet control. One column per Sheet Column where column name is the header of the sheet (row 0 values)
Response generated by the Sheets API or Errors with actionable messages

Select Credential → Load Available Drives for that User → User selects Drive → Load all spreadsheets from Drive → User  selects spreadsheet → Load Spreadsheet data and extract worksheets → User selects worksheet -> Load spreadsheet values and extract headers (values from the first row) → User selects key → User inputs values corresponding to each column header →  User adds response variable

Given a spreadsheet with that ID exists and a worksheet with that ID or name  exists, if key exists  and key values is found the row is updated in place else a new row is appended at end of table. Return Update or Append API response on success or appropriate errors.
to delete a spreadsheet by ID
I can clean up unused files.
Select the Google Drive location of your spreadsheet.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Select action control, default value “My google drive”
Select the spreadsheet you want to modify.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Drive control
Response generated by the Drive API or Errors with actionable messages
Select Credential → Load Available Drives for that User → User selects Drive → Load all spreadsheets from Drive → User  selects spreadsheet → User adds response variable
Given a spreadsheet with that ID exists and user has permission to delete it, then the file is permanently deleted (not trashed). Return empty body on success or appropriate errors.
to create a new Google spreadsheet
I can use it immediately in future steps.
Select the Google Drive location for your spreadsheet.
options are populated by on change event triggered by Select action control, default value “My google drive”
Column headers for you new spreadsheet. Values must be separated by comma ( , ).
Response generated by the sheets API or Errors with actionable messages
Select Credential → Load Available Drives for that User → User selects Drive and inputs Title and Headers → User adds response variable

A spreadsheet with the inputted values is created and moved to the desired Drive. If no Drive is selected, “My google drive” will be used as default value. Returns on Response Control the response of the POST request or appropriate errors.
Let PROCESIO users create and manage Google Sheets and their data directly from Processes.
predefined oauth2 google sheets in phase 1
options: static list representing possible actions described in user stories
all controls described in the user stories will be children of sidepanel
